Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Dish
Description: Circular dish with a flared mouth, simple lip and small flat base. The vessel is dark pink and was burnished on both surfaces, causing radiating pattern of vertical grooves on the inside and horizontal grooves on the outside. The gloss of this polish has almost entirely disappeared.
